title: [Bug]: Password can't be renewed
body: ### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA? No ### Describe the bug When beeing prompted for resetting an expired password, the input always gets rejected due to not following the rules ### What package are you using? Built from source ### Version 2.1.0 ### Reproduction steps ```markdown 1. Be in a tenant that enforces password reset every few weeks. 2. Login after your password has expired. 3. Try to reset the password. ``` ### Expected Behavior ```markdown 1.The password is correctly transmitted and changed. ``` ### Debug ```markdown Doesn't look useful: [2025-07-24 14:37:03.476] [debug] File logging at /home/stschiff/.config/teams-for-linux/logs/main.log with level silly [2025-07-24 14:37:03.477] [debug] Console logging enabled with level silly [2025-07-24 14:37:03.477] [debug] Logger initialised [2025-07-24 14:37:03.477] [info] configPath: /home/stschiff/.config/teams-for-linux [2025-07-24 14:37:03.477] [debug] configFile: {} [2025-07-24 14:37:03.479] [info] Running under Wayland, switching to PipeWire...
